```{r, echo=FALSE}
source("../../R/functions.R")
alumni <- read_mdtable(mdfile = "../../static/database/students.md", skip = 0)
alumni$Position_zh <- ifelse(alumni$Position == "PhD student", "博士生", "")
alumni <- alumni[alumni$Exit != "/", c("Name_zh", "Position_zh", "Entry", "Exit", "Supervisor", "Update_zh", "Contact")]
rownames(alumni) <- 1:nrow(alumni)
alumni$Supervisor <- convert_id2link(staff_id = alumni$Supervisor, language = "zh")
DT::datatable(alumni, escape = FALSE, 
              colnames = c("姓名", "身份", "加入时间", "离开时间", "导师", "目前状况", "联系方式"),
              options = list(lengthMenu = c(nrow(alumni), 5, 10)))
```
